articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Delegation of Juche Idea Study Societies
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Delegation of Juche Idea Study Societies
						

					 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by a delegation of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 66th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned by General Secretary Mikhail Panchenko who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Delegation of Juche Idea Study Societies
						

					Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and overseas Koreans visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace Sunday to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung.
					
					Among them were the delegation of the Communist Party of China headed by Guo Shengkun, secretary of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Regional Committee of the CPC, the delegation of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions headed by its General Secretary Mikhail Panchenko. Overseas Koreans' delegations were the delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan led by Kim Tong Ju, department director of its Central Standing Committee, and the delegation of officials of the new generation of the Korean Youth League in Japan led by Pae Jun Ryol, department director of its Central Standing Committee.
					
					They made a bow to the President in profound reverence for him.
					
					They made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Achievements in Sapling Production
articles.content:
Achievements in Sapling Production

					 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The forestry field of the DPRK has achieved successes in putting sapling production on scientific, industrial and intensive basis. 
					
					 The Central Tree Nursery of the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation updated its material and technical foundation. More than 200 tree nurseries of the country introduced the technology of sapling production by rotary spraying equipment, increasing the production capacity. 
					
					 The Central Tree Nursery has been spruced up as befitting the mass sapling production center. 
					
					 A production base of materials for paper humus-pot was newly built and facilities necessary for the production process were replenished. The annual production capacity is hundreds of tonnes. The project of water-supply and headwaters facility has been completed. 
					
					 The highly profitable open-air cultivating field and a good greenhouse covering hundreds of square meters were built and a combined control room for automatically monitoring the whole production process was installed. 
					
					 The nursery with increased capacity is now cultivating more than 9.3 millions of saplings of one hundred and dozens of species including Changsong Larch and Metasequoia glyptos troboides. 
					
					 Provincial tree nurseries are being updated into bases for the mass production of saplings of good species. 
					
					 The nursery in Pyongyang built a room for disseminating science and technology and the production process of the paper humus-pot equipped with modern facilities. 
					
					The nursery of South Phyongan Province newly made tall sapling production base covering at least 100 hectares and built the humus-pot production base. It is cultivating more than 800,000 saplings of dozens of species.
					
					 The nursery of North Phyongan Province completed nine construction projects including the 100-odd square meter grinding and mixing ground. 
					
					 Jagang Province is pushing ahead with the construction of the nursery of the province with a humus-pot factory of hundreds of square meters, greenhouse, hostel and other public service facilities at the final stage. 
					
					 The advanced sapling production technology has been introduced to cities and counties across the country. 
					
					 Hundreds of millions of trees were planted in mountains of the country during the period of national mobilization for improving land administration in spring this year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Visits to Foreign Countries Hailed by Myanmar Politician
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Visits to Foreign Countries Hailed by Myanmar Politician

					Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Aung Thein Lynn, member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar, congratulated General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his successful visits to Russia and China in the statement on Sept. 26.
					
					 The statement referred to his historic tours of Russia and China, adding:
					
					 The immortal exploits by Kim Jong Il in developing the traditional DPRK-Russia and DPRK-China friendly relations greatly encouraged progressive mankind of the world desirous of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 His historic visits to those countries greatly contributed to the regional development, the global peace and security and the accomplishment of the human cause of independence.
					
					 The Korean people are working miracles in every work site, firmly determined to bring pleasure to Kim Jong Il who made an immortal contribution to developing the relations with those countries and pushing forward socialist construction.
					
					 Rosy future is in store for Songun Korea led by Kim Jong Il.
